    debug = require('debug') 'gitlab:ApiBase'

class module.exports.ApiBase
  constructor: (@options) ->
    do @handleOptions
    do @init
    debug "constructor()"

  handleOptions: =>
    @options.verbose ?= false
    debug "handleOptions()"

  init: =>
    @client = @
    debug "init()"
    @groups         = require('./Models/Groups')        @client
    @projects       = require('./Models/Projects')      @client
    @issues         = require('./Models/Issues')        @client
  • ¶
